Key Match Events: Yoshinobu Yamamoto pitched a scoreless fourth inning with just 10 pitches.
Yoshinobu Yamamoto retired his last 11 batters faced and received a standing ovation.
Freddie Freeman hit a home run, extending his World Series record to 4 consecutive games with a home run.
Juan Soto hit a home run off Yoshinobu Yamamoto in the third inning.
Shohei Ohtani attempted to steal second base and was injured, leaving the field with a trainer.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers took a 2-0 lead in the World Series.
The Yankees need a win with Clarke Schmidt on the mound against Walker Buehler in Game 3 on Monday.
